SEARCH

Package gl.view

package gl.view
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GLChangeBoardSizePopUp
    The GLChangeBoardSizePopUp class represents a dialog for changing the board size in the Game of Life application.
    GLColorPalettePopup
    The GLColorPalettePopup class represents a popup window for selecting colors from a predefined palette or using a custom color picker.
    GLDebugStage
    A custom stage class that extends JavaFX's Stage class.
    GLFooter
    The GLFooter class represents the footer of the Game of Life application.
    GLHeaderImage
    The GLHeaderImage class represents a header view containing a custom image.
    GLMain
    The main class for launching the Game of Life application.
    GLMenuBar
    The GLMenuBar class provides the functionality for creating and updating a menu bar in the Game of Life application.
    GLView
    The GLView class is responsible for creating and displaying the main user interface of the Game of Life application.
